summary: Successfully fixed duplicate version display and scrolling issues

changes.description: Removed duplicate version display and fixed scrolling
details: Removed version footer section (lines 45-50) that displayed getFullVersionString()
Removed min-h-screen class from main container to prevent unwanted scrolling
Version now displays only once in ProfileTab as a card component

issuesFixed: No more duplicate version text on Settings page
Eliminated unwanted scrolling with no content at bottom
Cleaner page layout without min-height constraints
